evidence.text:
Person A: No one is dying Kaki. Come... let me take you back.
Person A: Don't you’ll have somewhere to be?
Person B: R U gng 2 pick me up 2day?

Person A: Are you hiding them under your tongue?
Person B: Prabha, I am going. Do yo need anything?

Person A: She is getting so big!
Person B: I found her loitering in the corridor outside Kulkarni’s flat
Person A: I asked Doctor Manoj if he will have a look at her...
Person A: I don’t know Aunty.

Person B: Prabha! Doesn’t your husband live there?
Person B: Or maybe he misses you! It is quite romantic-

Person A: Don’t mind her doctor, she talks more than she should.
Person A: The way you did! To doctor Manoj... you can’t do that! You can’t do whatever you want! If you behave like a slut, people will never give you any respect! Everyone is talking about you!
Person B: She is getting on my nerves.

Person B: Listen... I don’t know what came over me today... I don’t know why I said all that. I... I am sorry Anu...
Person B: No. Not at all. One day my father called me and said, come home. When I got there, they had already fixed my marriage. That’s the way it went.
Person A: You didn’t try to find out about him?
Person B: I did. I tried to meet him.
Person A: It must have been romantic!
Person A: Did you find him handsome?
Person B: I thought he was... Good looking.

Person B: My mother said the same thing! Your turn.
Person A: No no... You go again.
Person B: One sided game?
Person B: Please?

Person B: Prabha... Can I tell you something? My parents are also looking for a guy...for me to marry.
Person B: But I don’t want to.
Person A: Why don’t you talk to them?
Person B: As if it is possible to speak to my father.
Person B: Let her be...She did carry the big bag.
Person B: I think we should leave then...it will become late.
